attributes.action: Replace the current "Tax Disc" with an "Insured Vehicle Disc" and replace the road fund licence with a tax on fuel so polluters pay more.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Displaying a road fund licence disc serves no useful purpose. This should be replaced with a certificate of insurance disc so that members of the public can see at a glance if a vehicle is insured. The road fund licence should be scrapped and a CO2 tax added to pump prices so that higher polluters pay more.
